titles.title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to reduce the Medicare payment for general overhead costs of transplant centers in acquiring organs for transplant from organ procurement organizations.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 9/4/1996--Introduced. Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to limit Medicare payment of the overhead expenses of transplant centers to those costs directly attributable to acquiring organs from organ procurement organizations.
